name: Dead Zombie a Night of terror
name_original: Dead Zombie a Night of terror
description:
Keys: CTRL to Shoot or button 1 on mouse, 

C to Chop AXE, 

Space to Jump or mouse button 2

Objective:

Kill as many zombies then destroy the boss for victory. 

Turn on the boat and head to terror island.

Kill at least 50 kills to win.

Please note, this game is still a work in progress.

Thank you for playing and any donation is appreciated for future expansion.
